snippet: Even with the Helms amendment, foreign aid money could be used to provide abortions to victims of rape.
abstract: Editorial calls on Pres Obama to direct State Department and United States Agency for International Development to reject long-standing misinterpretation of Helms amendment, which restricts use of US foreign aid money to finance abortions overseas; contends Obama can significantly reduce harm done to women though unsafe abortions by allowing for exceptions to amendment in cases of life endangerment, incest and rape.
lead_paragraph: Even with the Helms amendment, foreign aid money could be used to provide abortions to victims of rape.
